translations: v.反击；抵制（counter 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 粒子计数器；粒子计数管；颗粒测量计数器
私下出售的；暗中作成的；违法的；走后门
售票台；售票柜台；票务处
补偿贸易；相向贸易；反信风

sentences.sentence: In Ireland, Guidelines on Countering Bullying Behaviour in Post-Primary Schools was published in 1993.
sentences.translation: 在爱尔兰，1993年发表了《关于中学制止欺凌行为准则》。

sentences.sentence: Another way of countering drought is to have a limited amount of mass above ground and to have extensive root networks below ground.
sentences.translation: 对付干旱的另一种方法是在地面上种植特定数量的植物，并且确保地下有广大的根系网络。

sentences.sentence: Countering Obama, Cruz proclaimed, was "the epic fight of our generation!"
sentences.translation: 克鲁兹将反对奥巴马比作“我们这一代人的史诗之役！”
